block_detail:
Block applications that you don't want to use VPN while connected.

After selecting or removing any item, if connected, please disconnect and reconnect the VPN.
about_description: Begzar is an open-source software designed to provide unrestricted access to the internet. This project is developed with the aim of providing a secure and reliable solution for users, and any commercial or non-commercial use of the Begzar source code is not permitted.
error_timeout: The connection to the server timed out, please try again.
error_domain: Error retrieving data, please try again.
error_get_version: Error checking the application version, please try again.
error_no_server_connected: No server found to connect. Please try again in a few minutes.
error_permission: No access to connect to the VPN.
update_description: Click the download button to download the new version.
update_install: No valid update version found for your device!
error_change_server: Please disconnect the VPN first, then change the server.
vpn_connection: You are currently connected to another VPN. Please turn it off and try again.
request_limit: Your request limit has been reached. Please try again in 1 minute.
wallet_address_copied: The TON wallet address has been copied to your clipboard. You can send TON to support us.
